header_text: You buy a new suit, which is very different from your usual style of clothes. You try it on to show your friend. When they see you, they pause. They then comment that it makes you look nice.

elements.Text: Did your friend think your new suit looked foolish?

elements.name: You buy a new suit, which is very different from your usual style of clothes. You try it on to show your friend. When they see you, they pause. They then comment that it makes you look nice._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
